metadata.title: CVE-2025-23085 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A memory leak could occur when a remote peer abruptly closes the socketwithout sending a GOAWAY notification. Additionally, if an invalid headerwas detected by nghttp2, causing the connection to be terminated by thepeer, the same leak was triggered. This flaw could lead to increased memoryconsumption and potential denial of service under certain conditions.This vulnerability affects HTTP/2 Server users on Node.js v18.x, v20.x,v22.x and v23.x.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
